casebody.data:
LOUIS BERGER v. STATE OF MARYLAND. [No. 22,

October Term, 1933.]

Decided October 27th, 1933.

The cause was submitted to Bond, C. J., Pattison, Urner, Adkins, Offutt, Digges, Parke, and Sloan, JJ.

Bernard Ades, for the appellant. Wm. Preston Lame, Jr., Attorney General, G. C. Anderson, Assistamt Attorney General, and A. Theodore Brady, State s Attorney for Anne Arundel County, for the State.

The opinion was delivered

per Curiam.
